bill.title: Honorable Jenny Oropeza Memorial Overcrossing.
bill.description: Relative to the Honorable Jenny Oropeza Memorial Highway.

history.action: Introduced. Referred to Com. on RLS.
Re-referred to Com. on T. & H.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on T. & H.
From committee: Be adopted. Ordered to consent calendar. (Ayes 8. Noes 0. Page 3461.) (May 8).
Read second time. Ordered to consent calendar. Re-referred to Com. on APPR. pursuant to Joint Rule 10.5.
From committee: Be placed on second reading file pursuant to Senate Rule 28.8 and ordered to consent calendar.
Read second time. Ordered to consent calendar.
Read. Adopted. (Ayes 33. Noes 0. Page 3619.) Ordered to the Assembly.
From committee: Be adopted and re-refer to Com. on APPR. (Ayes 9. Noes 1.) (June 18). Re-referred to Com. on APPR.
From committee: Be adopted. Ordered to third reading. (Ayes 16. Noes 1.) (August 8).
Read. Amended. Adopted. (Ayes 73. Noes 0. Page 6057.) Ordered to the Senate.
In Senate. Concurrence in Assembly amendments pending.
Assembly amendments concurred in. (Ayes 38. Noes 0. Page 4763.) Ordered to engrossing and enrolling.
Enrolled and filed with the Secretary of State at 3:30 p.m.
Chaptered by Secretary of State. Res. Chapter 102, Statutes of 2012.

votes.desc: Do pass and be placed on the Consent Calendar
Be adopted and be re-referred to the Committee on Appropriations
SCR 79 Lieu  Senate Third Reading  By LOWENTHAL
